import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Radium from 'radium'; class PageOne extends Component { externalSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() summary = political + economical + environmental + legal + technological; political = event.target["political"].value economical = event.target["economical"].value social = event.target["social"].value technological = event.target["technological"].value environmental = event.target["environmental"].value legal = event.target["legal"].value this.props.bp.push(summary) console.log(this.props.bp) }; render() { const style = { backgroundColor: 'lightyellow', border: '2px solid black', ':hover': { backgroundColor: 'lightgreen', color: 'black' } } const inputStyle = { width: '90%', height: '150px' } return (
this.externalSubmit(event)}>

PAGE 1/6

Start from your environmental researches

External analysis

use PESTEL in order to cover the basic points

Political
Tips Examples
Economical

Social

Tips Examples
Environmental

Tips Examples
); } }; export default Radium(PageOne)
